Topic.Title: Yes, Mayer was a terrible, frivolous hire. But all she needs to do is sell the company and....

Message.Msg: I think a FB/YHOO merger would be a smart move especially for FB. It would double their size (revenues and more than double earnings) and give them more credibility as an ongoing company for the long term rather than a potential Myspace that could be gone in 10 years. Plus FB would get a lot of cash (the AG sale and additional 550 mil royalties, plus the Y-Jap sale) and they could go into search big time, (end deal w/ MSFT). And the China exposure and other 20% of AG, patents, sites. Perhaps one share of FB, or a bit more (equiv of $25) and while it dilutes FB by about 50% of their present (now low) market value what they get from YHOO more than makes up for that. That combined company would be worth the $100 bil FB expected and with a bullet. Doubt that will happen and the best is still for MSFT or AAPL to just buy YHOO with their inflated shares.

Topic.Title: Yes, Mayer was a terrible, frivolous hire. But all she needs to do is sell the company and....

Message.Msg: YES for FB 1- It gets over $16 Billion cash in next 2 yrs. 2- It gets all of Yahoo patents (30,000 patents) 3- It blocks Google's ad tech and other purchases from Yahoo. 4- IT GETS INTO CHINA via Alibaba 5- Agree w your structure of FB part stock part cash. For YHOO 1- Gain full access to FB data base and wall street fund raising down the road. 2- Synergy to monetize / DO BUSINESS with 1.5 Billion people (roll my eyes) 3- Become more compelling to all advertisers. 4- Cut overlapping operations= cut costs. 5- Loeb makes couple billion + Marissa make $100M+ we get crumb.

Topic.Title: Something BIG is brewing

Message.Msg: Marissa and LOEB Use Cost Co and WalMart model of group buying to save your members $$ on : 1- Auto insurance 2- Banking- Free checking and Bill Pay 3- Cell phone services 4- Computers and software services Coop (Unite small business servie providers=USBSP) 5- Tax Prep Coop (USBSP) 6- Vacation and travel services Coop (USBSP) 7- Medical and life insurance Coop (USRSP) 8- Mortgages This will cover each consumer's housing AND non-housing regular monthly and annual expenses we all spend !!! Make 2% on $100 Bil NET + advertising of these Coop service members. = $3 to $5 Billion net income BOOST. ONE STOP SHOPPING AND SAVINGS FOR OUR REGULAR EXPENSES. We save 5% to 15% on our current bills (not new bills)= LOYALTY NS REPEAT DOING BUSINESS $$$ with Yahoo.

Topic.Title: Something BIG is brewing

Message.Msg: Internet IS ABOUT CUTTING DOWN THE DISTRIBUTION COSTS AND INCREASE DISTRIBUTION EFFICIENCY ! Yahoo has 700M not spending much of their monthly and annual expenses via Yahoo. WELL, if Yahoo can step up and negotiate wholesale discount and make a small spread, the profit will be easily accretive ASAP: 100M netting Yahoo $50/person = $5 BILLION net profit while these consumers save 5 to 15% on their regukar consumption.
